issue.title: [Website] Build more detailed Community landing page a la Apache Spark
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2912](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2912). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be useful to have some prose descriptions of where to get help and where to direct questions. See example:

http://spark.apache.org/community.html
